Instance.description: Main container class that holds all data for a client tutorial.

Tunable.name: allowed_in_casdemo
Tunable.description: Allow this Tutorial in CAS Demo

Tunable.name: category
Tunable.description: The tutorial category in which this tutorial belongs.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: Name of the tutorial. i.e. if this is a tutorial about Build/Buy you might put 'Build Buy Mode'

TunableTuple.name: notification
TunableTuple.description: This is the notification that will show when you are eligible for this tutorial. When a tutorial triggers, we show a notification and let the player decide if they want to click the notification to see the tutorial.

Tunable.name: audio
Tunable.description: The sound to play when the dialog is shown.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed

Tunable.name: secondary_icon
Tunable.description: A secondary icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: text
Tunable.description: The dialog's text, a localized string that may use tokens.

TunableList.name: ui_responses
TunableList.description: A list of buttons that are mapped to UI commands.

TunableList.name: slides
TunableList.description: These are the slides (images with a description) that create the story for this tutorial. They will be shown in the order they are provided, so the first slide in this list will be the first slide of the tutorial.

Tunable.name: image_console
Tunable.description: The image for this slide on console. If unset the Image will be used as a fallback.

Tunable.name: image_console_jp
Tunable.description: The image for this slide on console for the JP SKU. Fallback order is: Image (Console), Image.

TunableEnum.name: platform_filter
TunableEnum.description: The platforms on which this slide is shown.

TunableList.name: triggers
TunableList.description: These are the events that can trigger this tutorial. i.e. if this is a Build/Buy tutorial, we might want to trigger this tutorial when you build something, buy something, or enter build/buy. You could add all three of those events and this tutorial will trigger if any one of them happen. The tutorial tip will be triggered at any point that one of these events is even triggered.

Tunable.name: ui_sort_order
Tunable.description: Sort order for UI purposes. Relative to other tutorials
